modifications.instruction: Modify the code to increase the size of the dog's ears
Change the color of the dog's fur to a darker shade
modifications.result_description: A dog with a darker brown fur

modifications.instruction: Change the shape of the dog's paws to a more rounded shape
Add a tongue to the dog's mouth
modifications.result_description: A dog with a tongue hanging out of its mouth

modifications.instruction: Increase the size of the dog's eyes
Change the color of the dog's eyes to blue
Add a collar to the dog's neck
modifications.result_description: A dog with a collar around its neck

modifications.instruction: Change the background color to a bright green
modifications.result_description: A dog on a bright green background

modifications.instruction: Increase the length of the dog's snout
modifications.result_description: A dog with a longer snout

modifications.instruction: Add a ball next to the dog
modifications.result_description: A dog with a ball next to it
